name: Secondary Explosive Shells
description:
After a character switch takes place on this side of the field: Deal 1 Pyro DMG to the character switched to.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character switch takes place on this side of the field:</color> Deal 1 $[K103] to the character switched to.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character switch takes place on this side of the field:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> to the character switched to.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
